scripts.new-ver: npm version patch && npm run build && git commit -am 'new version' && git push origin
scripts.dev-test: ts-node ./src/index.ts test-data/v3.0 test-data/v3.1 --title 'REST API Spec' --subtitle 'Created with ApiBake' --separate-schemas
scripts.dev-private-test: ts-node ./src/index.ts test-data/private --title 'REST API Spec' --subtitle 'Created with ApiBake' --separate-schemas
scripts.prod-test: npx apibake@latest test-data/v3.0 test-data/v3.1 --title 'REST API Spec' --subtitle 'Created with ApiBake'
